general.name: mos_target_skies_v2
general.description: This table stores the positions used as blank sky regions for DR18 targetting. The sky regions are selected by dividing the sky in tiles of HEALpix nside 32. Each tile is then subdivided in candidate regions of HEALpix nside 32768 and the pixels that meet the isolation requirements are considered valid skies. This process is repeated for a number of all-sky catalogues. See <a href="https://sdss.org/dr18/targeting/fps/"> for further details of the process by which suitable sky locations are selected in SDSS-V/FPS.

surveys.name: BHM
surveys.description: An optical time-domain spectroscopic survey of quasars and X-ray sources

surveys.name: MWM
surveys.description: A time-domain, optical+IR spectroscopic survey of Milky Way stars of all types.

general.naming_convention: $MOS_TARGET/[V_TARG]/mos_skies_v2-[NUM].fits, where V_TARG=1.0.1 for DR18; and NUM = 1..1 to partition the file into parts

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

pix_32768.name: PIX_32768
pix_32768.description: The HEALpix pixel (nside=32768, nested indexing, Equatorial coords) of the sky region.

ra.name: RA
ra.description: The RA of the centre of the sky pixel.

dec.name: DEC
dec.description: The declination of the centre of the sky pixel.

down_pix.name: DOWN_PIX
down_pix.description: The HEALpix pixel (nside=256, nested indexing, Equatorial coords) of the sky region. Used internally to downsample the list of candidate region.

tile_32.name: TILE_32
tile_32.description: The HEALpix pixel (nside=32, nested indexing, Equatorial coords) of the sky region.

valid_gaia.name: VALID_GAIA
valid_gaia.description: Whether this is a valid sky region in the Gaia catalogue.

selected_gaia.name: SELECTED_GAIA
selected_gaia.description: Whether this sky region was selected in the Gaia catalogue.

sep_neighbour_gaia.name: SEP_NEIGHBOUR_GAIA
sep_neighbour_gaia.description: Separation to the nearest Gaia DR2 neighbour

mag_neighbour_gaia.name: MAG_NEIGHBOUR_GAIA
mag_neighbour_gaia.description: Magnitude of the nearest Gaia DR2 neighbour (G band, Vega).

valid_ls8.name: VALID_LS8
valid_ls8.description: Whether this is a valid sky region in the Legacy Survey DR8 catalogue.

selected_ls8.name: SELECTED_LS8
selected_ls8.description: Whether this sky region was selected in the Legacy Survey DR8 catalogue.

sep_neighbour_ls8.name: SEP_NEIGHBOUR_LS8
sep_neighbour_ls8.description: Separation to the nearest Legacy Survey DR8 neighbour

mag_neighbour_ls8.name: MAG_NEIGHBOUR_LS8
mag_neighbour_ls8.description: Magnitude of the nearest Legacy Survey DR8 neighbour (r-band, AB).

sep_neighbour_ps1dr2.description: Separation to the nearest PanSTARRS1 DR2 neighbour

mag_neighbour_ps1dr2.name: MAG_NEIGHBOUR_PS1DR2
mag_neighbour_ps1dr2.description: Magnitude of the nearest PanSTARRS1 DR2 neighbour (r-band, AB).

valid_tmass.name: VALID_TMASS
valid_tmass.description: Whether this is a valid sky region in the 2MASS point source catalogue.

selected_tmass.name: SELECTED_TMASS
selected_tmass.description: Whether this sky region was selected in the 2MASS point source catalogue.

sep_neighbour_tmass.name: SEP_NEIGHBOUR_TMASS

valid_tycho2.description: Whether this is a valid sky region in the Tycho2 catalogue.

selected_tycho2.description: Whether this sky region was selected in the Tycho2 catalogue.

valid_tmass_xsc.description: Whether this is a valid sky region in the 2MASS extended source catalogue.
